vote.text: Amendment SA 5032 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5032 proposed by Senator Cantwell for Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S2461; text: CR S2461-2462) To amend the preamble.
